title: Add visible Generate Logo button to Logo Concept Generator form

requirements.summary: Add a clearly visible, prominently styled 'Generate Logo Concept' submit button to the bottom of the Logo Concept Generator form that triggers logo generation and displays the 10-variant showcase
acceptanceCriteria: The Logo Concept Generator form contains a clearly visible submit/generate button at the bottom of the form
The button is labeled with an obvious action label such as 'Generate Logo Concept' or 'Generate Logo'
The button is styled with the app's gold accent color consistent with other tool buttons
Clicking the button triggers the logo concept generation and renders the 10-variant logo showcase
The button shows a loading/disabled state while the generation is in progress
The button is not hidden, obscured, or visually indistinct from surrounding elements

file_operations.description: Add a submit button element at the bottom of the form (after the Tone select field) with the text 'Generate Logo Concept'. Style the button with gold accent background (bg-[oklch(var(--gold-accent))]), white text, rounded corners, padding, hover effects, and disabled state styling. Ensure the button is type='submit' so it triggers the existing handleSubmit handler. Add disabled={isLoading} to prevent multiple submissions and conditionally render a loading spinner or 'Generating...' text when isLoading is true. Position the button prominently with sufficient margin-top spacing from the form fields above it.
